This week on the Healthyish podcast, Amanda Shapiro brings in test kitchen director Chris Morocco and BA contributing editor Amiel Stanek to talk about what “simple” means to them, how they’re really cooking right now, and whether a dip can be a meal. Also on the menu: the “Short is Sweet (And Savory!)” recipe collection in the June/July issue of the magazine and online, which is loaded with easy dinner ideas like a punchy Vietnamese Tomato Salad, Chicken Seekh Kabobs, and a sweet dessert dip (yes, we said dessert dip).ContentThis content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.Stuff we talk about in this episodeShort Is Sweet (And Savory)!DIY Sour MixChicken Seekh KebabsChintan Pandya on InstagramTuk Trey Ping Poh With Pork ChopsKreung Cambodia on InstagramVietnamese Tomato SaladHa’s Dac Biet on InstagramStracciatella Fruit DipKitty’s MarketAmiel Stanek on InstagramChris Morocco on InstagramHow to ListenListen to this episode through the audio player on this page, or subscribe via Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts to get all six episodes.
